message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_FV_VERIFIABLE_DATA_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verifiable Data Item record has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_FV_VERIFICATION_CATEGORY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verification Category has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_FV_DATA_ITEM_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verifiable Data Item of this type already exists.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_REQ_EXISTS
message.locale: The verifiable data item cannot be deleted until all associated verification requirements have been removed.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_DEPENDENT_DATA_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: The verifiable data item cannot be deleted until all dependent data items have been removed.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verifiable Data Item with the name specified already exists for this category. Please enter a new Name.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_ITEM_UTIL_EXISTS
message.locale: The verifiable data item cannot be deleted until all associated verification item utilizations have been removed.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_XRV_EDIT_EVIDENCE_TO_TEMPORAL_PARTICIPANT_USAGE_RECORD_EXISTS
message.locale: The evidence type can not be modified to a Non Participant Evidence Type if a usage record of Non Case Data already exists for this Data Item.

message.name: ERR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEMID_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_USAGE_VERIFICATION_APPLICATION_MODIFICATION
message.locale: The Verifiable Data Item cannot be modified as it has been used in the application.
